title: 01/25/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/25/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Howie Long about making a decision to retire from football. Howie retired in his early 30's, what sparked that decision and what factors did he consider? CBS' lead play-by-play voice Jim Nantz calls in to discuss, in his opinion, what was the best game he and Tony Romo have called together, Bills/Chiefs. And Ryan Clark calls in to discuss Cooper Kupp not getting the respect as one of the games best Wide Receivers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Howie Long about making a decision to retire from football. Howie retired in his early 30's, what sparked that decision and what factors did he consider? CBS' lead play-by-play voice Jim Nantz calls in to discuss, in his opinion, what was the best game he and Tony Romo have called together, Bills/Chiefs. And Ryan Clark calls in to discuss Cooper Kupp not getting the respect as one of the games best Wide Receivers.
